title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 139 - Share Of A Nonresident Estate, Trust Or Beneficiary In Income From New York State Sources
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 139 - Share Of A Nonresident Estate, Trust Or Beneficiary In Income From New York State Sources

State Regulations
§ 139.1 - Share of a nonresident estate, trust or beneficiary in income from New York State sources
§ 139.2 - Distributable net income from New York State sources
§ 139.3 - Modifications
§ 139.4 - Allocation of distributable net income from New York State sources and modifications (net change)
§ 139.5 - Character of items

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 139

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697

This Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made
by the Tax Reform and Reduction Act of 1987 (Chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987)
and certain other amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
